MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  FK5 postcode area of Larbert, affecting properties in Burnhead Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:20pm. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:34pm on the 8th of December 2020
